introduction:
My name is Stjepan Grgic. I describe myself as a designer who loves to code, take photos, draw... Interaction design and user experience are the fields I focus most of my energy lately. There, I can be creative with everything I love to do.
Drawing helps me visualize my thoughts and express my ideas. Photography was essential for my understanding of light, color and all principles of great design.
Coding gives me the power to prototype interactions and to build anything I can imagine.
Currently, I am living in Zagreb, Croatia where I run my own UI/UX design studio called underlayer.

employment.name: Underlayer
employment.introduction: I have started underlayer studio with hopes I will be able to run business all by myself. I worked on few nice projects. But, it was a tough year. I learned a lot. I saw how business requires a lot of effort so now I can appreciate business people much more.

projects.name: Memgraph
projects.description: MemGraph is a young startup that is building next generation graph database system. I designed their logo and overall design language fo app. Also, I was working on designing and coding a web interface that will be used for querying database, monitoring machines, and monitoring performances.

projects.name: Agrivi
projects.description: Agrivi is agri-tech startup from Croatia. I worked on redesigning their brand identity:  a new logo, font, color palette, visual language, and imagery. My primary job was to redesign web application interface, so I worked with product guys to deliver the best experience for their users. Lastly, I worked on landing page redesign as well.

projects.name: nickel&swan
projects.description: Nickel&swan is a fin-tech startup focused on building innovative software traders and brokers. I worked on designing part of their web application that you can check out live here.

employment.name: Vibby
employment.introduction: I was a lead product designer. I was involved in branding, introducing new product concepts, designing experience and interface, as well as coding HTML and CSS architecture for this large scale web application. Year almost passed, and I saw I gave all that I could to the idea, so I decided i should try to go on my own.

projects.name: Vibby player
projects.description: Video player that introduced 'partial' video bits. It allowed users to watch and comment only on important/highlighted parts of the video.

projects.name: Vib creation proces
projects.description: A simple tree step process user had to go trough in order to create a “vib” - a shorter form of a video created from its parts.

employment.name: Gray Entourage
employment.introduction: In joint venture Gray Entourage, I was involved in advertising projects ranging from designing online advertising materials for clients like Microsoft, Erste Bank, Vipnet and Tomato, to designing websites for TZ Istra and Allianz. After almost a year, and beautiful time I have spent with the team, I got chance to work fro startup that I couldn't reject.

projects.name: Vip Xmas Card
projects.description: I was involved in whole process: from the beginning of ideation and character development to UI design and character illustration.

projects.name: Share Istria
projects.description: I worked on look & feel development, photography, art direction, design for desktop and mobile, as well as icon design.

employment.name: virtus dizajn
employment.introduction: It was my lucky job. They gave me chance me to come back to Zagreb after bad family situation. I worked on a couple of nice websites that I designed and coded. However, the way they have run business didn't fit my wiev, so I  went on the search for another job.

employment.name: Agencija Točka
employment.introduction: My first real job. It was short, but I had great experience. I was learning from them, and made friends along the way.
